templates.title: Spoolman
templates.name: spoolman
templates.description: Keep track of your inventory of 3D-printer filament spools. Spoolman is a self-hosted web service designed to help you efficiently manage your 3D printer filament spools and monitor their usage.
templates.note: Filament spool inventory management for 3D printing

env.name: SPOOLMAN_DB_TYPE
env.label: SPOOLMAN_DB_TYPE
env.description: Database type: sqlite, mysql, postgres, cockroachdb

env.name: SPOOLMAN_LOGGING_LEVEL
env.label: SPOOLMAN_LOGGING_LEVEL
env.description: Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL

env.name: SPOOLMAN_AUTOMATIC_BACKUP
env.label: SPOOLMAN_AUTOMATIC_BACKUP
env.description: Automatic nightly backup for SQLite databases
